projects.title: Book Campaign System
projects.bodyText:
- Developed as part of All World Gayatri Pariwarâ€™s initiative 
 - Contributed to backend development, creating a platform for managing book distribution campaigns. Features included user registration, inventory management, and real-time tracking of campaign metrics.

projects.title: Somaiya Club Connect
projects.bodyText:
- Centralized platform for KJ Somaiya Institute, connecting various student clubs on a single website
 - The platform featured event calendars, membership sign-ups, and interactive club profiles, improving student engagement.

projects.title: GameONN
projects.bodyText:
- Built a comprehensive sports information repository covering 22 sports.
 - sports. Integrated features for searching and filtering information, enhancing user experience by providing detailed rules and statistics for each sport..
 - Uses **MyPHPadmin** database to store texts.

projects.title: Inventory Management
projects.bodyText:
- An Applet which performs ADD, DELETE and EDIT for Products.
 - Used Python for the layout and MySQL for operations.

projects.title: Calculator App
